page.title: 07Employment in Pennington
page.content: Most people in the Pennington area work in Barrow-in-Furness which is about six miles away.About the same number work in Ulverston,which is about one and a half miles away.Some people work in Pennington and fewer still work in Lindal and Dalton.Many mothers do not go out to work but of those who do,most work part-time to suit school hours.Fewer mothers work full-time.Some people work in factories producing chemical goods or electrical goods.Other people work in offices and shops.Quite a few people work in our school.Some of the men and boys work as tradesmen in the shipyard at Barrow-in-Furness and some work on farms.A small number of people own their own businesses.By far the most people travel to their employment by car.Some workers travel by bus.Others cycle.A few people walk to work.
